Card.cardDescription: You target all other heroes, each target hero must play an ATTACK. If a target hero does not play an ATTACK, deal 1 damage to that target hero.
You target all other heroes, each target hero must play a DODGE. If a target hero does not play a DODGE, deal 1 damage to that target hero.
You target all heros, each target hero gains 1 health.

Reveal X cards from the top of the library, where X is number of surviving heroes. Starting from you in turn sequence, each hero picks a revealed card and takes it into their hand. Any remaining cards are move into the discard pile.
You draw two cards from the library.
Cancel target tactics card effect targeting a hero or another target card.
Choose a target hero and discard a discard a card from that hero's hand, equipment zone, or judgement zone.

Choose a target hero (other than youself) with a weapon in their equipment zone. That hero must play an ATTACK on another target hero of your choice who is within their attack range. If that hero does not, take that hero's weapon card into your hand.

Choose a target a hero, that hero must discard an ATTACK card; if that hero discards an ATTACK, you must now discard an ATTACK card; repeat the process until a hero can no longer discard an ATTACK. The hero that can no longer discard an ATTACK is declared the loser and is dealt 1 damage by the winner.
Choose a target a hero within your physical range; you take one card from his hand, equipment zone or judgment zone it into your hand.

Choose a target hero with at least one card in their hand; that hero reveals a card from their hand. You may discard a card with the same suit as the revealed card; if you do, you deal 1 Fire damage to that hero.

Choose up to 2 target heroes, you may chain or unchain their hero cards.
Recast: You may discard this card during the main phase of your turn to draw a card from the library.
